description: This trail is near the town of Walnut Creek and is popular with bikers, hikers, and horseback riders. Numerous trails through the park can be combined for hikes and rides of assorted lengths. The trail detailed in the GPS track data is a mix of fire road and single track. Note: As with most California area parks, bikes are restricted to fire roads and marked trails only.
directions: From I-680 take Ygnacio Valley Road east to Homestead Avenue. Turn right followed by the first left on to Marshall Drive. Drive to end of road and park.
title: Shell Ridge Bike
